name: ColorFilled
description:
Created for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 112 - Theme "Color The World"

In this 2D Platformer, You get to paint your own platforms!

Help Epo get across this world filled with empty canvases!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

P/X - Paint a Cloud

O/Z - Paint a Wall

R - Reset the level, if necessary

Any feedback appreciated!

Ps. Sorry! I didn't have enough time to add music!
